title: Pset_MaterialThermal
description: A set of thermal material properties.

SpecificHeatCapacity.title: SpecificHeatCapacity
SpecificHeatCapacity.description: Defines the specific heat of the material: heat energy absorbed per temperature unit.

BoilingPoint.title: BoilingPoint
BoilingPoint.description: The boiling point of the material (fluid).

FreezingPoint.title: FreezingPoint
FreezingPoint.description: The freezing point of the material (fluid).

ThermalConductivity.title: ThermalConductivity
ThermalConductivity.description: The rate at which thermal energy is transmitted through the material.
